name: Almost Immortal
description:
The powerful witch that you are has been cursed to get older by the second. Use your power to take the lifespan of the pour souls that cross your path and delay the inevitable: your own death. But beware not to abuse your power to your own demise!

Gamepad Controller/Mouse&Keyboard supported

Credit

newAnim - Design/Programming

RisuNiku - Art/Animation

CallicouJack - SFX/Music
